snippet.title: 'ORION: Dino Beatdown' Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The much anticipated full trailer for 'ORION: Dino Beatdown' has finally arrived.  This showcases the pure joy and excitement waiting inside these Dinosaur infested worlds.  Get a glimpse of all the worlds, the vehicles and the madness that is coming your way on Friday, April 20th, 2012.

ORION: Dino Beatdown will be available for purchase on Steam and OnLive.
